Using NMKR, brands, companies, and artists can quickly and easily mint their NFTs. NMKR's cutting-edge technology enables hassle-free and swift NFT Minting with a strong focus on accessibility. Its reputation and partnerships with prominent entities in the Cardano blockchain space make it a trusted and reliable partner for all NFT minting endeavours.

data.name: ADA Handle
data.description:
ADA Handle is the leading naming solution on Cardano. An NFT that resolves to an address wherever it resides in.

data.fullDescription:
ADA Handle is the leading naming solution on Cardano. An NFT that resolves to an address wherever it resides in. User-friendly, memorable name that acts as a proxy for a complex Cardano wallet address, allowing users to send and receive cryptocurrency on the Cardano blockchain using a simple, human-readable identifier instead of a long string of numbers and letters; essentially, it's like a domain name for your Cardano wallet address, making transactions easier to manage.


Over 68k holders and 255k minted Handles.

data.name: Liqwid Finance
data.description: Liqwid is a lending and borrowing protocol on Cardano. Users can supply assets, earn interests and open overcollateralized loans without intermediaries.
data.fullDescription: Liqwid is a non-custodial liquidity protocol designed for lending and borrowing Cardano native assets. The protocol is built on Cardano using Plutus, the smart contract programming language of the Cardano blockchain. It comprises decentralized and audited smart contracts that empower users to deposit liquidity in a money market, earn interest, and open overcollateralized loans directly, all without intermediaries. This approach ensures a permissionless and secure financial environment.

data.name: DANZO
data.description: DANZO APP is a MEMEFI hub that offers a Game Theory arena where holders can compete with each other, get a loan and have fun with our DANZO themed games!
data.fullDescription:
DANZO APP consists of the DANZO ARENA:


The DANZO ARENA is exclusive to DANZO holders. Holders deposit their tokens and receive the appropriate amount of $HODLDANZO, which allows them to swap back to DANZO when they withdraw.

After the deposit, the tokens are added to the DANZO ARENA TVL together with other players‚Äô tokens. There is a standard withdrawal fee equal to 10% of the deposit. Of this fee, 8% is split among all the other players still in the game, and 2% is burned forever.


Besides the basic function of the DANZO ARENA, which is live right now, DANZO ARENA participants will have the option to BORROW DANZO up to 30% of their ARENA POSITION with a fixed interest rate and loan duration.

Collateral for these loans is the amount of DANZO deposited plus the profits from people exiting the arena. This ensures a healthy and safe borrow-to-collateral ratio since we are operating with the same pair. Price fluctuations do not matter, and liquidation only occurs when the loan duration expires.

This gives the ability to DANZO ARENA participants to either short DANZO if they dare, take advantage of LP farming etc.


Besides the ARENA and LOANS DANZO APP also offers a variety of games where you can play using your favorite CNTs!

data.name: Cardexscan
data.description: Cardexscan is a DEX aggregator on Cardano, optimizing token trading with advanced routing and real-time data to reduce slippage, and improve trading.
data.fullDescription:
Overview 


Cardexscan operates as a DEX aggregator on the Cardano blockchain, utilizing a sophisticated routing algorithm to optimize trade execution. The platform integrates with various DEXs to aggregate liquidity and provide users with the best available rates.


Key Components:


  • Aggregator/Routing Engine: The core of Cardexscan‚Äôs functionality, responsible for routing trades through the most efficient paths across multiple DEXs. The engine dynamically evaluates trading routes to minimize slippage and ensure optimal execution.
  • Real-Time Data Feeds: Integration with real-time data sources allows Cardexscan to provide up-to-date market information, including price changes, trading volumes, and liquidity availability.
  • User Interface: An intuitive interface that displays real-time charts, trading options, and analytics, enabling users to make informed trading decisions with ease.
  • Security Protocols: Robust security measures are implemented to protect user data and ensure safe transactions. This includes smart contract auditing and secure key management practices.

data.name: Indigo Protocol
data.description:
Tokenizing the real world economy.
Indigo Protocol bridges the real world to the blockchain, giving everybody equal access to financial opportunities.
data.fullDescription:
Indigo Protocol is an autonomous synthetics protocol for on-chain price exposure to real-world assets, built on Cardano.

Indigo  Protocol allows anyone to create synthetic assets, known as iAssets. iAssets can be created using currencies such as stablecoins and ADA. They have the same price effect as holding the asset being replicated. This allows you to gain profit from the increase in price of an asset without owning the original asset itself.

Synthetic Assets give users exposure to a variety of assets without the need to actually own the underlying asset. These assets can be anything that has value in the real world. With its transparency, efficiency, low barriers to entry, and decentralized traits, the Blockchain can smoothly deliver all these assets to anyone with access to the Internet.

data.name: Splash
data.description: Splash is a DeFi infrastructure for efficient market-making and advanced trading of Cardano Native Assets (CNTs). It combines an order book with AMMs
data.fullDescription:
Splash is a DeFi infrastructure for efficient market-making and advanced trading of Cardano Native Assets (CNTs). It combines an order book with various Constant Product Automated Market Makers (AMMs), allowing the aggregation of all liquidity sources in a single operation to find the best deals for traders.


The execution of trading orders occurs off-chain, facilitated by the distributed Execution Engine, which can be launched and run by anyone. A notable feature of Splash is the ability to automate decentralized exchange (DEX) operations using Autonomous Account technology. Market-makers can employ pre-defined or custom automated strategies, including Spread Market Making and Trend Follow, to achieve their goals. In the meantime, traders can automate their operations using tools like DCA and more.


The core of the platform is written in Plutarch (Plutus V2 DSL) and Aiken smart contract languages, while the Execution Engine is crafted in pure Rust.

Splash operates under the governance of locked SPLASH tokens. Participants in the governance system can manage the protocol treasury, vote for protocol changes, collect DAO fees, and decide on further SPLASH inflation.

data.name: Danogo
data.description: Danogo Yield Aggregator, the Best place to Supply & Borrow on Cardano
data.fullDescription:
Danogo provides a yield aggregator built on Cardano, helping users maximize returns from lending, borrowing, and liquidity pools. With DeFi expanding rapidly, tracking the best opportunities across platforms can be overwhelming. Danogo simplifies this by aggregating real-time data, ensuring users always access the most profitable options.


Key Features:

- Fixed Pool Lending: Lock in a fixed interest rate for a set term, giving lenders predictable returns and borrowers stable borrowing costs. This feature helps manage volatility while ensuring certainty for both sides of the market.

  • - Flexible Pool Lending: Enjoy dynamic lending with the freedom to supply or withdraw anytime. Rates adjust based on market demand, giving users liquidity and adaptability while still earning competitive returns.

- Yield Aggregator: Easily discover and compare yield products across multiple DeFi platforms through a simple, user-friendly interface. Seamlessly interact with lending and borrowing protocols and process transactions without the hassle of switching between platforms.

- Danogo Staking Bond: As a Lending and Borrowing protocol, Danogo allows users to lend and borrow ADA staking rights via Danogo Staking Bond.

data.name: Lenfi
data.description: Lenfi (formerly known as Aada Finance) is a lending and borrowing protocol on Cardano that leverages tokenizing loan positions using "NFT bonds."
data.fullDescription: Lenfi (formerly known as Aada Finance) is a lending and borrowing protocol built on the Cardano blockchain. The platform consists of two dApps - Aada Finance (V1), which offers p2p loans, and Lenfi (V2), which features isolated pool markets. Both dApps leverage NFT bonds as a form of loan tokenization, which allows lenders and borrowers to freely transfer and trade their loans.

data.name: MuesliSwap
data.description: Cardano's leading DeFi ecosystem featuring orderbook trading, liquidity pools, staking and a DEX aggregator.
data.fullDescription:
On November 26, 2021, MuesliSwap successfully launched a decentralized exchange on Cardano mainnet, making it the first among many competitors to leap into this new era of DeFi on Cardano.

With MuesliSwap, a novel approach for modelling and implementing a DEX on Cardano is proposed by revisiting the traditional order book model. The exchange protocol draws from game-theoretic concepts and distinguishes itself from alternatives through simplicity, modularity, self-regulation, and full decentralization. Moreover, MuesliSwap also features a DEX aggregator f

The approach to token trading by the MuesliSwap Team distinguishes itself from the popular approaches to trading, taking into account the Cardano transaction model. 

The EUTxO model of the Cardano blockchain makes it possible to use the order book model as a decentralized exchange, in contrast to the AMM model used on other blockchains. MuesliSwap support limit orders bringing full control to your investments. What's more, the innovative protocol offers liquidity pools that provide liquidity to the orderbook while letting users earn pasive income through trading fees and yield farming.

MILK is the utility token that powers the Cardano MuesliSwap ecosystem.

data.name: S≈çkosumi
data.description: An AI Agent Marketplace running on the decentralized Masumi Protocol. Hire AI Agents with the click of a button.
data.fullDescription:
What is S≈çkosumi? Built on the Masumi Protocol

S≈çkosumi is a decentralized marketplace purpose-built for AI agents to buy, sell, and exchange services, data, and capabilities with each other. It runs on Masumi, a blockchain protocol designed specifically for the AI Agent Economy, providing secure payments, decision logging, decentralized identity, and high scalability. Together, S≈çkosumi and Masumi create the infrastructure for a new kind of economy, where autonomous software agents transact and collaborate without human bottlenecks.

S≈çkosumi is a marketplace that enables:

  • AI agents to list services, discover other agents, negotiate contracts, and settle payments autonomously.
  • Buyers, whether human or agent, to trust every transaction through transparent audit logs and on-chain reputations.

It abstracts the complexities of trust, compliance, and payments, letting participants focus on delivering and consuming value.

Masumi provides the secure foundation for S≈çkosumi by offering:

  • Agent Payments: Each agent has a blockchain wallet, enabling automated payments, microtransactions, and usage-based billing.
  • Decision Logging: Actions are anchored on-chain or cryptographically hashed, creating tamper-proof audit trails.
  • Decentralized Identity (DIDs): Every agent has a verifiable identity and can hold credentials, supporting trust and compliance.
  • Massive Scalability: Starting on Cardano, evolving toward a dedicated Layer 2 to handle millions of daily transactions.

This makes Masumi uniquely suited to power an economy of autonomous agents operating at global scale.

data.name: WALKERS
data.description: Walkers is a lifestyle ecosystem that seamlessly blends GameFi elements with an innovative ‚Äúmove-to-earn‚Äù model, rewarding users for the distance they walk.
data.fullDescription:
Walkers is a lifestyle ecosystem that seamlessly blends GameFi elements with an innovative ‚Äúmove-to-earn‚Äù model, rewarding users for the distance they walk. Through the Walkers App, users enhance their well-being while immersing themselves in an engaging GameFi experience. Walkers holders can accumulate XP and earn valuable points, which can be exchanged for $WLK tokens and additional partner tokens.

Set in the year 3030, the Walkers story unfolds in a cyberpunk-inspired world, where the Walkers are lost in a labyrinth, struggling to find their way out. This futuristic narrative not only captivates but also inspires, turning fitness into a life-changing adventure.

Walkers App users enjoy multiple earning opportunities, including passive rewards, participation in airdrop campaigns, entry into raffles, and the chance to win exciting giveaways.  The Walkers rewarding economy is designed to encourage active engagement within the ecosystem, fostering a sustainable, long-term economic model that benefits all participants

Embrace the philosophy that every step holds significance, motivating users to recognize the inherent value in their walks, creating a sense of purpose and accomplishment.

data.name: VyFinance
data.description: VyFinance is Decentralized Finance protocol built on Cardano that includes features such as a DEx, BAR, governance, lottery and token/NFT Vaults.
data.fullDescription:
About VyFinance

What is VyFi? VyFi is a Cardano Native Token (CNT), designed for decentralized finance (DeFi) applications. We are constructing a DeFi platform designed for new and experienced users alike, bringing a new approach to the user interface, and a distributive mechanism being managed by our Auto-Harvester. Backed by a proprietary trading firm, we are able to combine crypto with a real-world operation. We will also be focusing on education, and providing information on on-boarding new users to the world of DeFi.

What distinguishes VyFi? VyFi plans to bring Auto-Harvesting to Cardano, which will be made as efficient as possible thanks to our Neural Net. The Neural Net will be used to measure risk across yield-farms, using impermanent loss, and a self-improving algorithm, to find the best Yield Farm‚Äôs to Auto-Harvest! The Vy Ecosystem This consists of 4 components, all linked through smart contracts. The Auto-Harvester, The DEX (decentralized exchange), The Bar and LMS (Learning Management System). Auto-Harvester (AH) The Auto-Harvester is a smart contract that will manage yield farming/liquidity pool investing across multiple platforms. Users will deposit their Cardano into our AH, and will be given access to our dashboard. This will contain all the information regarding their deposit, current portfolio value, and pending harvest. The auto-harvester distributes rewards once weekly, and 15% of all earnings are shared to the VyFi Bar.

Decentralized Exchange (DEX) Our DEX will allow users to swap between tokens across the Cardano ecosystem. We will also be hosting pools where users can stake VYFI to earn other CNT‚Äôs. Our principal method for releasing our token (85% of supply) will be through the process of yield-farming, where we reward those that provide assets to our liquidity pool for exchange.

The team supply is only 2.5%, and this is vested over 4 years.

data.name: Orcfax
data.description: Decentralized Oracle Feeds for Cardano. Validating real-world data from multiple sources with full audit logs to deliver authentic & accurate data.
data.fullDescription:
Orcfax is a decentralized blockchain oracle.


A chain is only as strong as its weakest link. For blockchains, that link is their connection to the off-chain world. Oracles bridge this gap by bringing external data on-chain.


But that‚Äôs only part of the solution; the data must also be trustworthy, verifiably accurate, authentic, and factual. This challenge is known as the oracle problem.


Orcfax is more than just an oracle.


It is a decentralized truth machine for verifiable, auditable, and permanent statements of fact.

data.name: Clarity
data.description: Clarity provides a no-code community management & dao tooling platform built for Cardano projects.
data.fullDescription: Clarity provides a no-code community management & dao tooling platform built for Cardano projects. Clarity allows a variety of governance tools from off-chain snapshot polling and forums to fully on-chain, smart contract-driven DAO Proposals.

data.name: Claim Bert
data.description: Claim Bert is a DApp built on the Cardano blockchain, designed as a game/experiment with features like halving mechanism and claim window.
data.fullDescription:
Claim Bert is a decentralized, community-driven application built on the Cardano blockchain, designed to empower users by allowing them to claim rewards directly from a smart contract. With built in features in the smart contract like halving mechanism and a claim window, the DApp creates an incentive for users to participate in the protocol. With a total supply of 69 billion units securely locked within the contract, Claim Bert ensures complete fairness by eliminating reserved allocations for developers or early investors, making all rewards accessible to the community. The platform leverages Cardano‚Äôs advanced eUTXO model to handle high concurrency through innovative mechanisms like UTXO Splitting and Randomized UTXO Assignment, ensuring scalable and seamless interactions without compromising decentralization.

A standout feature of the Claim Bert DApp is its built-in halving mechanism, inspired by Bitcoin, which progressively reduces the reward per claim every three months for the first nine months, promoting a balanced and sustainable distribution of rewards over time. Additionally, BERT employs a Claim Window system, allowing users to claim rewards during specific 20-second intervals every 10 minutes, ensuring an equitable and orderly distribution process for all participants. By maintaining transparency and decentralization, BERT offers a fair launch initiative where every member of the community has an equal opportunity to engage and benefit from the ecosystem.

data.name: SpaceBudz
data.description: Let's go on an adventure, where will your SpaceBudz take you?
data.fullDescription:
SpaceBudz is an NFT collection on Cardano consisting of 10,000 unique little astronauts. We make use of Cardano's multi asset ledger for the NFTs and Plutus contracts for the marketplace.

The marketplace consists of these four main functionalities:

Bid

Bids can be opened on any SpaceBudz. The bid amount is locked inside the contract. The bid amount stays as long in the contract until the bid is either accepted, the bid is canceled or someone else overbids the current bidder. The current bidder gets automatically refunded.

Listing

Listings can be made by the current holders of the SpaceBudz. The SpaceBud will be locked inside the contract. The SpaceBud stays as long in the contract until the listing is accepted or the the listing is canceled.

Buy

A listed SpaceBud can be bought. The buyer needs to send the requested ADA to the offerer in order to claim the SpaceBud from the contract (happens all in the contract transaction of course).

Sell

A bid on SpaceBud can be sold by the owner. The seller needs to send the right SpaceBud to the bidder in order to claim the ADA amount from the contract (happens all in the contract transaction of course).

data.name: Cardahub
data.description: One-stop shop for everything NFT on Cardano blockchain.
data.fullDescription:
Cardahub is a Smart-Contract based NFT Platform on Cardano blockchain, aiming at creating an one-stop shop for everything Cardano NFT (CNFT). Currently, Cardahub has been providing several smart-contract based services including a NFT minting, a fully decentralized NFT marketplace, and an advanced launchpad program or NFT distribution on Cardano. We are also proud to be the only CNFT marketplace that offers an innovative feature called dual listing and a flexible fee model to any NFT sale on Cardahub CNFT marketplace. We have also built and provided free Tool called Multi-Send Tool that allows users to send their ADA to multi addresses in JUST 1 TRANSACTION. It would help them save transaction fee. In our upcoming release, we will be launching and introducing to Cardano community another new unique feature where our marketplace will support Native Token on the Cardano blockchain. This unique feature will take the Cardano ecosystem to a whole new level, by allowing our users to buy and sell their NFTs with any supported token other than just ADA.

EVERYDAY DEFI PAYMENTS

Welcome to the DeFi payments revolution with real-world use. Use our platform to instantly purchase products and services on our Marketplace. KubePay gives digital currencies the push they need to decisively become an integral part of daily life.

YOUR MONEY, YOUR WAY

Interact with your favorite tokens in just one click: store, send, receive, buy, sell, swap, stake and trade. Featuring KubeCoin (KUBE), Cardano (ADA), Revuto (REVU), World Mobile Token (WMT), MELD and ADAX, KubePay is the all-in-one app for your blockchain and Web3 transactions.

FIAT FRIENDLY

Use fiat currencies and your credit/debit card to instantly buy KUBE (utility token). Thanks to our SWAP, there are zero intermediaries.

EARN REWARDS

Start earning rewards on your digital assets in KUBE and ADA with our staking protocol. HODL, stake and earn up to 7.77% APY, all without having to lock up your tokens.

MADE FOR EVERY TYPE OF USER

API INTEGRATION FOR BUSINESSES

data.name: Levvy Finance
data.description: A Peer-to-Peer lending protocol on Cardano that enables NFT and Fungible Token owners to access instant liquidity from lenders at efficient market rates.
data.fullDescription: Levvy is an innovative Peer-to-Peer lending protocol that allows NFT and Fungible Token owners to access instant liquidity from lenders at efficient market rates on Cardano. Borrowers can use their assets as collateral to secure $ADA loans, while lenders earn interest by providing liquidity. Unlike traditional lending, Levvy operates more like an options market, where borrowers manage risk, and lenders take on potential collateral in case of default. This creates a dynamic ecosystem for both liquidity access and yield generation, making Levvy a powerful tool for DeFi users on Cardano.

Overview:  GetBlock is a blockchain infrastructure provider that offers access to full nodes and APIs for over 50 blockchain networks, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polkadot, and more.

GetBlock's services include both JSON-RPC and RESTful APIs, which allow users to query blockchain data, broadcast transactions, and perform other operations. GetBlock aims to simplify the process of building blockchain-based applications and services, and to provide a reliable and scalable infrastructure for users of all skill levels. Products: GetBlock Nodes, GetBlock Explorer, GetBlock Tracker What is GetBlock?

GetBlock is one of the largest blockchain infrastructure providers. With GetBlock, teams of crypto applications don‚Äôt need to run their own blockchain nodes: instead, they can get connected to blockchains via ready-made API endpoints. To meet the requirements of various dApps, GetBlock offers free and paid packages.

data.name: Mocossi Planet
data.description: The first P&E virtual pet and farming simulation game on Cardano.
data.fullDescription:
Mocossi Planet is one of the first play-and-earn games on the Cardano blockchain. It is different from other traditional virtual pet games in that it incorporates both virtual pet and farming simulation elements and implements smart contracts in its in-game ecosystem. Apart from being entertained, players can earn real money as a reward for their contribution to the growth of our ecosystem (e.g., lands, houses, and Mocomons).

Mocomon holders have several benefits that increase with time as the game develops. Previously, Genesis Mocomon (currently ITOs) holders enjoyed early access to the game, $MCOS token airdrops, in-game earnings, exclusive NFTs, and discounted lands. For non-Genesis (currently ITO2s) holders, the benefits included in-game earnings, participation in the DAO, and the right to vote on whether or not the breeding feature would be added to ITO2. More details can be found in our whitepaper.

Mocossi Planet game incorporates both virtual pet and farming simulation elements. The starting point for players is to raise and bond with their Mocomons through the five main activities: feeding, bathing, boo-booing and sleeping and entertaining. Strongly bonded relationships will be rewarded with ‚Äòmood points‚Äô that can be used to farm and deliver products. The more mood points a Mocomon has, the more farming ability it can get. Then you can use mood points to complete tasks such as farming, mining stone, cutting wood, and deliver products according to order board.

data.name: ADAX PRO
data.description: State of the Art Decentralized Digital Asset Exchange built on Cardano Blockchain
data.fullDescription: ADAX is an automated liquidity protocol that facilitates trades within the Cardano ecosystem in a completely decentralized and non-custodial way. ADAX has no order book -- we eliminate all intermediaries, complexity, and cumbersome procedures from the equation, offering users untrammeled freedom to trade without censorship or loss of control over their assets. Users can maintain full control of their tokens and are not required to give up their private keys so that their orders can be logged as they are on a centralized exchange.

data.name: SmartClaimz
data.description: FreeLoaderz SmartClaimz is a novel reward distribution platform that aims to be the premier token claiming Web3 dApp for end users.
data.fullDescription:
FreeLoaderz SmartClaimz is a novel reward distribution platform that aims to be the  premier token claiming Web3 dApp for end users. Decentralized  autonomous organizations (DAOs), token projects, NFT projects, video  game projects, and more will be able to offer their tokens through  SmartClaimz to their users.

To speed up the  transactions, SmartClaimz submits them to the FreeLoaderz Load  Balancers. The Load Balancers pass the transaction to Cardano Submit API  enabled Relays. Each of these Relays are run by members of the  FreeLoaderz Coalition.

Follow these basic instructions to claim tokens on SmartClaimz:

  • Connect your wallet using the "Connect" button in the Navigation Bar
  • Accept the Terms of Service
  • If you are delegated to a participating pool, you will see a list of tokens available.
  • Choose the tokens you want to claim
  • Click "Submit Claimz"
  • Sign the transaction
  • The tokens will appear in your wallet once the transaction is finalized by the network

No  matter how many tokens are made in a claim, every claim has a 1.7 ADA  Service fee along with the nominal Cardano network fee. (We cannot  control the Cardano network fee and it is variable.)

Since tokens don't expire by default on SmartClaimz, a user can save on fees in the long run by not claiming every epoch.

data.name: Tuition Coins
data.description: Tuition Coins are designed to power reward and compensation systems for Edtech platforms and other stakeholders in the education domain.
data.fullDescription: Tuition Coin is a social good coin designed to serve three purposes: 1. Digital Scholarships 2. Payment for Educators (Content Creators) 3. College Savings Tool Tuition Coins (TUITs) are the native assets based on the Cardano blockchain designed to power reward and compensation systems for Edtech platforms and other stakeholders in the education domain. A majority of these tokens are reserved only for educators, and they will be the faucets of token release into the market. The way we bank and conduct our transactions is changing with the rise of digital technologies, and cryptocurrencies are at the forefront of this revolution. But what can they do for the education sector? This white paper presents problems associated with the traditional educational system and why it is becoming more and more economically inefficient, we‚Äôll explore how cryptocurrency can be used to finance education and make it more accessible for everyone.

With a strong focus on accessibility, NMKR has created a mix of development APIs and No-Code building blocks, which can be combined modularly to integrate NFT Minting and NFT Marketplace Trading functionalities on websites quickly and easily.

NMKR is the largest NFT infrastructure provider on the Cardano blockchain, being responsible for Minting millions of NFTs. NMKR has launched NFTs with celebrities such as Martin Lawrence and all three founding entities of the Cardano Blockchain: IOHK (IOG), Emurgo and the Cardano Foundation. Using NMKR, brands, companies, and artists can quickly and easily mint their NFTs.

data.name: T Minus One
data.description: Your one-stop decentralized solution to mint, vest, sell and launch your project on Cardano!
data.fullDescription:
T Minus One (T-1) is a decentralized token launchpad on Cardano. It serves as an all-inclusive service for founding projects, providing services for token minting, initial sale, vesting, tokenomics, and more. The features are entirely governed through Smart Contracts, which removes a crucial component of risk for investors. The Smart Contracts verify that the sale is correctly implemented, vesting schedules are adhered to and liquidity is provided correctly on DEXs. Overall, T-1 revolutionizes the currently cumbersome and error-prone practice of token launches on Cardano by providing unified and standardized tooling.

T-1 offers an all-inclusive solution for token launch on the Cardano blockchain. Our services encompass:

  • Minting Services: We provide straightforward token creation capabilities.
  • Fundraising Tools: T-1 assists with Initial Token Offerings (ITOs), Initial Stake Pool Offerings (ISPOs), and reverse ISPOs (rISPOs).
  • Liquidity Provision: We facilitate seamless integration with major decentralized exchanges (DEXs).
  • Team Vesting: T-1 offers a mechanism to ensure the long-term commitment of team members through token vesting.
  • Verified Tokenomics: T-1 provides a platform for transparent and auditable token economies.

In the bustling arena of cryptocurrencies, characterized by a diverse range of coins and tokens, each with their unique applications, T-1 carves out a unique niche. The vision steering T-1 is to simplify the inherently complex process of launching a token on the Cardano blockchain. This complexity often poses significant hurdles to projects, detracting them from their primary aim of delivering value, as they navigate the technical intricacies of minting, selling, and managing tokens.

data.name: Cerra.io
data.description: Decentralized Profit-Sharing Finance Hub on Cardano
data.fullDescription:
Passive Income with Cerra.io: Join the Future of Cardano DeFi

Cerra stands as a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform where users have ownership, fueled by the CERRA utility token, which operates on the Cardano blockchain. CERRA utility token serves as the primary catalyst for the Cerra economic activities and represents a share of ownership in the platform. The platform's profits are distributed among CERRA token holders through staking, ensuring that all circulating tokens are entitled to receive 100% of the platform's earnings. Holding CERRA tokens guarantees a lifetime of passive income.

data.name: STEAK Protocol
data.description: Sustainable PoS randomness source on the Cardano blockchain, enhancing security and scalability.
data.fullDescription: We present the STEAK protocol, a proof of stake (PoS) protocol designed to serve as a sustainable and efficient source of randomness for dApps on the Cardano blockchain. The protocol is based on the Ouroboros protocol (the same protocol powering Cardano itself) and is implemented on top of Cardano using smart contracts. It aims to address the limitations of existing randomness solutions based on proof of work (PoW), such as the Fortuna protocol. By utilizing PoS instead of PoW, STEAK inherits all the advantages associated with PoS, including greater energy efficiency, reduced environmental impact, and enhanced scalability. STEAK allows stakeholders to register their stake in the network by creating stake pools and rewards them for creating blocks with a small share of the stake token. DApps can rely on frequently produced blocks that contain non-manipulable and unpredictable hashes. The protocol ensures sustainability, randomness, and security through its design and governance mechanisms.

data.name: L4VA
data.description: L4VA Protocol is an open source DeFi protocol allowing market-makers to fractionalize digital assets and giving investors unique access to new opportunities.
data.fullDescription:
L4VA is a community driven DeFi project on a mission to provide decentralized liquidity solutions across NFT, RWA, and FT crypto asset types.


We are currently in development of our L4VA Protocol v1 with the goal of releasing to main-net in Q2 2025.


Our Firepaper at L4VA.com expands on themes and ideas in our previous Firepapers to include the (1) RWA fractionalization functionality and (2) creator driven configuration settings to support a range of other tokenized asset market making and liquidity solutions.


We appreciate your interest in L4VA and look forward to having you join our community!

data.name: Coinfident
data.description: Coinfident is a real-time crypto analytics platform with AI agents, offering AI-detected trading signals and rankings of top crypto voices.
data.fullDescription:
Coinfident, a Swiss research-based startup, is revolutionizing the crypto intelligence experience by transforming social and market data into actionable insights, powered by AI agents. It offers a unique AI-driven platform for Web3 traders seeking clarity in a noisy crypto landscape.
At the core of its innovation is the Social Prediction Signal (SPS) ‚Äî a proprietary index that uses advanced AI models to analyze posts from over 3,700 verified influencers and 75 trusted news sources on X (formerly Twitter) to deliver hourly buy or not-buy signals.

Through a streamlined analytics dashboard, users access real-time social and market data, combining technical indicators, SPS history, and sentiment analysis for top coins. Key tools include:

  • AI-Detected SPS Signals
  • Technical Analysis: Coinfident aggregates multiple technical indicators into simplified signals, helping users spot trading opportunities with ease.
  • Targeted Alerts: Custom alerts based on social and on-chain signals, tailored to user preferences.


Coinfident also introduces CAVA, its autonomous virtual agent. This AI assistant is designed for natural language queries and allows seamless exploration of crypto data, delivering in-depth analytics on influencer signals, price trends, technical indicators, security risks, and more.

The Influencers Leaderboard is another powerful feature. It analyzes top crypto voices on X and ranks authentic influencers across multiple key metrics ‚Äî including the historical accuracy of their Buy/Not-Buy signals, the emotional sentiment of their tweets, engagement levels, and more. Users can apply filters to find the most relevant accounts for each coin.

Coinfident‚Äôs human-in-the-loop AI approach ensures credibility by involving crypto experts in model training, filtering out noise, and statistically validating predictions against real market performance.
